translations: 萌芽, 发芽；迅速增长

sentences.sentence: Plants burgeon from every available space.
sentences.translation: 植物能从任何可获得的空间中迅速生长。

sentences.sentence: My confidence began to burgeon later in life.
sentences.translation: 我的信心到了晚年开始迅速增长。

sentences.sentence: When spring is coming all trees began to burgeon.
sentences.translation: 春天到来的时候所有的树木开始发芽。
